title: Cardiac transplantation and other therapeutic options in the treatment of end-stage heart disease.
summary: This article focuses on the surgical treatment of heart failure. It reviews the advances and limitations of heart transplantation and gives a broad overview of emerging technologies in the treatment of end-stage heart disease....
